virtual void Util::IStream::read ( Mode  m,
void *const   data,
size_t  count 
) [pure virtual]

Read unformatted bytes This method is called when all formatted data has been converted for heterogeneous communication. This method may be overloaded by derived class.

Parameters:
m [in] the mode of access (immediate or differed)
data [in] the pointer to the data to communicate
count [in] the number of formatted items to write
